h4.strong: The mission of Nueces Canyon CISD is to collaborate with our families and community in order to prepare students for the future and equip them with 21st century skills. Rigorous instruction will be provided and an emphasis will be placed on preparing our students to be independent thinkers. NCCISD students will be ready for college and career opportunities and will become productive, respectful, and confident citizens who understand the value of serving others.
